definition: to translate and edit/translator-editor/(computing) to compile (source code)

transliteration (rendering phonetic value, e.g. of English words in Chinese characters)/characters giving phonetic value of Chinese word or name (when the correct characters may be unknown)/transcription (linguistics)/to transcribe phonetic symbols
to break a code/to crack a riddle/to solve an enigma/a breakthrough

sentences.english: we can offer: Website translation service, language interpretation service, editing service, proofread-ing service and more
sentences.chinese: 相關的俄文或英文文件翻譯及俄漢口譯工作。

sentences.english: The cool drink was garnished with a slice of lemon.
sentences.chinese: 譯這種冷飲用了一片檸檬作裝飾。

sentences.english: Ancient poetry word middle have the verse "translating" the sum "day lily"?
sentences.chinese: 古詩詞中有“譯”和“萱”的詩句麼？

sentences.english: One may sooner fall than rise.
If you use a Web site project, you do not have to precompile pages into assemblies.
sentences.chinese: 如果使用網站項目，則無需將頁預編譯爲程序集。

sentences.english: Can I disable precompilation for a particular folder?
sentences.chinese: 我可以爲一個特定的文件夾禁用預編譯？

sentences.english: Hushi's translation ideas rise in his literary proposition .
sentences.chinese: 胡適之譯學理念發軔於其文學主張。

sentences.english: Bill Clinton previously served as the governor of Arkansas.
sentences.chinese: “克林頓以前曾做過阿肯色州州長”這句話該如何譯？

sentences.english: The housewife haggled over the price with the vendor for half an hour.
sentences.chinese: 譯這個主婦同小販討價還價了半個小時。

sentences.english: Paid human translators, unsurprisingly, still produce the best results.
sentences.chinese: 當然，有償的人工繙譯質量最好。

sentences.english: There is no simple nostrum for political and social evils.
sentences.chinese: 譯對付政治和社會罪惡沒有簡單的妙方。

sentences.english: It is freezing cold. It is a bone-chilling cold.
sentences.chinese: 都可以譯爲“刺骨地冷，冷死人了”。

sentences.english: The climate of Arkansas is favorable to diversified agricultures.
sentences.chinese: 譯阿肯色州的氣候適宜於多種農業。

sentences.english: Incidentally, what comes from the online translation softwares may not be correct.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，在線翻譯軟件譯出來的可能是不對的。

sentences.english: If the precompiled header file can't be used, it is ignored.
sentences.chinese: 如果無法使用這個預編譯頭文件，那麼將忽略它。

sentences.english: Prosperity discovers vices and adversity virtues.
sentences.chinese: 譯〕順境顯邪惡，逆境見善德。

definition: to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
name of a book/reputation as calligrapher
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs

Chinese language (Mandarin), emphasizing its national nature/Chinese as a primary or secondary school subject/Chinese in the context of the Nationalist Government/Guoyu, book of historical narrative c. 10th-5th century BC
